net.codemusic.smartears
Class ExampleManager

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--net.codemusic.smartears.ExampleManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
IExampleManager
public class ExampleManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements IExampleManager

The example manager controls the portion of the system that handles all example-related activities such as playing, repeating, enabling, and disabling answers.

Constructor Summary
ExampleManager(IExampleEventManager eem, IAnswerManager am, IRangeManager rm)
          Constructs a new examplemanager that will communicate with the supplied object
 
Method Summary
 void disableAnswer(IAnswer a)
          Removes an answer from the collection of possible answers

          Adds an answer to the collection of possible answers
 void play()
          Plays an example that the user must answer/identify
 void repeat()
          Plays the previous example again
